title: HALSTON HERITAGE
seo_title: HALSTON HERITAGE |  WestHouse Hotel New York
seo_description: Roy Halston Frowick was the creator of luxury American fashion, whose groundbreaking designs still influence and inspire us today.
contents: Roy Halston Frowick was the creator of luxury American fashion, whose groundbreaking designs still influence and inspire us today. Founded in the 1960s, the HALSTON label took the fashion industry by storm. Known for his innovation in millinery, Halston used his signature materials of jersey, cashmere, and suede to reinvent the jumpsuit, the shirtdress, and the classic caftan, permanently leaving his mark on fashion.
